item.description:
"Our local group is getting pretty good as new folks have joined lately.
There is also one in Boston that is REALLY good
(http://groups.drupal....) in part because it's run by one the true
Drupal geniuses (and great guy) Moshe Weitzman.

We don't have any agenda - we just get together and talk about what we are
doing."

"We're a very informal group of Drupal people with various skill levels.
Some of us are stronger in module development and writing code while
others are more proficient at theming Drupal and getting into the look
and feel.

The meetings to date follow no structure. We present things we work
on. If someone has a question as to how we did something, we share
that. This particular meeting is coming on the heels of DrupalCon and I
suspect lots of tips and techniques will be shared.

If you're interested in learning more about Drupal, please come by. The
group is most helpful. I only started working with Drupal last
November. The people have been most generous with their knowledge.
